title: (x) "Thank You" fairly common handwritten sans - ITC Tempus Sans {Brandon S}
content:
I’m doing a favor for a friend and making some quickie place cards for a shower. Can anyone tell me what font is used on their favor so I can try to match it? It seems like it’d be simple — but I’m so not a font guru. TIA!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226011812im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/favor_3618.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Kate Moss perfume - custom designed by Paul Barnes w/ Peter Saville {Eric Hague}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226011812/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38766 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for a sans similar to Etica ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226011812/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38760 "Go to next forum topic")
author: showandtell
